PHRASE.LANG: Take part in Red Bull activities on PlayStation®Home to help to add to the Community Score. Take to the skies in Air Race, test your memory at the Vending Machine and soar through the air in Flugtag to add points to the score. As the points roll in, more pieces will be added to the Red Bull can statue until it's complete.

Participez aux activités Red Bull sur PlayStation®Home pour contribuer au Score de la Communauté. Envolez-vous pour la Course Aérienne, mettez votre mémoire à l'épreuve sur le Distributeur et traversez les cieux dans le Flugtag pour ajouter des points au score commun. Chaque point supplémentaire ajoutera une pièce à la statue de la canette Red Bull jusqu’à ce qu'elle soit terminée.

Nimm in PlayStation®Home an Aktivitäten von Red Bull teil, um die Community-Punktzahl zu erhöhen. Nimm am Air Race teil, teste dein Gedächtnis am Getränkeautomaten und segele beim Flugtag durch die Luft, um Punkte zu erzielen. Je mehr Punkte zusammenkommen, desto mehr Teile werden der Red Bull Dosenstatue hinzugefügt, bis sie fertig ist.

Partecipa alle iniziative di Red Bull su PlayStation®Home per aiutare la community a incrementare il suo punteggio. Prendi il volo con la Air Race, metti alla prova la tua memoria al Distributore e librati nei cieli in Flugtag per far aumentare il punteggio. Più aumenta il punteggio, più pezzi saranno aggiunti alla statua della lattina di Red Bull fino a quando non sarà completa.

Participa en las actividades de Red Bull en PlayStation® Home para contribuir a la Puntuación de la comunidad. Surca los cielos en Air Race, pon a prueba tu memoria en la máquina expendedora y emprende el vuelo en Flugtag para agregar puntos a la puntuación. A medida que vayan aumentando los puntos, se agregarán más piezas a la estatua de latas de Red Bull hasta que se complete.

Take part in Red Bull activities on PlayStation®Home to help to add to the Community Score. Take to the skies in Air Race, test your memory at the Vending Machine and soar through the air in Flugtag to add points to the score. As the points roll in, more pieces will be added to the Red Bull can statue until it's complete.

Take to the skies in Air Race, test your memory at the Vending Machine and soar through the air in Flugtag to add points to the score. As the points roll in, more pieces will be added to the Red Bull can statue until it's complete.
